data.name: First Home Buyers Home Loan
data.description: A First Home Buyers Home Loan is an exclusive package for first home buyers. Benefit from a lower deposit required, a choice of fixed or variable rate, and the flexibility for your loan to grow with you.

features.additionalInfo: Access your money 24/7 through Internet Banking, Telephone Banking or Mobile Banking services.

Offset optional:  Multiple Offset Accounts can be linked to a Variable Loan.  The balance in this account reduces the interest you pay on your mortgage. A minimum $500 balance must be retained in the Offset Account to receive the benefit.
LVR: Borrow up to 95% of the value of the property (inclusive of LMI). Exclusive to first home buyers participating in the First Home Loan Deposit Scheme only.
Redraw payments made in advance at any time through Internet and Mobile Banking.  Minimum redraw amount is $500.

eligibility.additionalValue: Lending criteria, requirements and terms and conditions apply

eligibility.additionalInfo: Available for customers aged 18 years and over
Membership:  You must be or become a Beyond Bank Australia member.
Lending criteria applies. Terms, conditions, fees and charges apply.

Eligibility: This package is exclusive to first home buyers participating in the First Home Loan Deposit Scheme only. Applicants may need to complete a statutory declaration of application or provide evidence of first home buyer status at our request.  Conditions apply.

Must be an Australian citizen, permanent Australian resident or hold a Visa. If a Visa holder's income is relied upon to determine serviceability, the term of the Visa must exceed the term of the loan.

fees.name: Total Home Loan Package Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged annually for those who have a Total Home Loan Package.

fees.name: Package Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable on each existing loan when you request to switch between packages.

fees.name: Mortgage Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable on establishment of the loan.

discounts.description: No Mortgage Loan Establishment Fee - First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package

eligibility.additionalInfo: This fee is waived on First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package loans.

fees.name: Mortgage Discharge, Settlement or Partial Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever a mortgage is discharged or partially discharged

fees.name: Loan Variation Documentation fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable when a property already held by us as security is to be used as security for additional credit.

discounts.description: No Loan Variation Documentation fee - First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package

eligibility.additionalInfo: This fee is waived on First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package loans.

fees.name: Redraw (staff-assisted) Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable for each staff-assisted redraw.

fees.name: Redraw (online) fee
fees.additionalInfo: Online redraw via Internet or Mobile Banking is free.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable whenever we send you a default notice because you have defaulted under the contract or related mortgage.

fees.name: Hold Fixed Interest Rate
fees.additionalInfo: The amount of this fee is 0.15% of the loan amount and is payable should you wish to hold a fixed interest rate from time of loan application to settlement.

fees.name: Rate Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable each time you ask us to vary the type of interest rate (variable to fixed or vice versa) or refix your loan.

discounts.description: No Rate Variation fee - First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package

eligibility.additionalInfo: This fee is waived on First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package loans.

fees.name: Mortgage Loan Settlement Fee (a)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable for a new loan settled.

discounts.description: No Mortgage Loan Settlement Fee (a) - First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package

eligibility.additionalInfo: This fee is waived on First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package loans.

fees.name: Mortgage Loan Settlement Fee (b)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable for each loan variation or top up settled.

discounts.description: No Mortgage Loan Settlement Fee (b) - First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package

eligibility.additionalInfo: This fee is waived on First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package loans.

fees.name: Security Handling Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable if you ask us to prepare documentation to note a change of your name on the title, or produce your land title.

fees.name: Additional Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable when we prepare any security in addition to the mortgage over the primary mortgaged property.

fees.name: Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable for each search we conduct in relation to a loan or security.

fees.name: Default fee on Home and Investment Loan - on the 8th day
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable on the 8th day you are in default.

fees.name: Default fee on Home and Investment Loan - every 14th day thereafter
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable every 14th day thereafter for so long as you remain in default.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package. Owner occupied, principal & interest, LVR <=95% & a minimum of $50,000 new money. Only available to participants in the First Home Loan Deposit Scheme. Conditions apply.

First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package. Owner occupied, principal & interest, LVR <=95% & a minimum of $50,000 new money. Only available to participants in the First Home Loan Deposit Scheme. Conditions apply.

First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package. Owner occupied, principal & interest, LVR <=95% & a minimum of $50,000 new money. Only available to participants in the First Home Loan Deposit Scheme. Conditions apply.

First Home Buyers Total Home Loan Package. Owner occupied, principal & interest, LVR <=95% & a minimum of $50,000 new money. Only available to participants in the First Home Loan Deposit Scheme. Conditions apply.
